speaker: char
text: Honey, you really tried to make me look bad but as I suspected, it had no effect.

speaker: char
text: My striking features prevailed and they turned to stone when they couldn't resist gazing upon me. I would say it’s a shame…

speaker: char
text: But it is good for the ego.

speaker: char
text: Sometimes I think I must be choosing them wrong, if they can’t focus on my other qualities.

speaker: char
text: But my looks are what attracts them in the first place, are they not?

speaker: char
text: This time, try to do something outlandish, something distracting. Maybe that will work.
